

## Loading packages

To load a package after you have installed it, use the `library()` function. 
In this tutorial we will use the [tidyverse][tidyverse] package.

```{r, 'load_tidyverse', echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
# Load tidyverse
library(tidyverse)
```

</br>

We will also use the [lingStuff][lingStuff] package, which is available on 
[GitHub][GitHub_lingStuff]. 

```{r, 'load_lingStuff', echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
# Load lingStuff
library(lingStuff)
```
